Reward points that never expire
Enjoy the first year for free (Annual fee:  1500)
Benefits of the card:
Earn Plus points up to 5% on your daily spends with instant redemption at POS, against miles and cash back.
5% Plus points for  5,000 and above transactions
2% Plus points for transactions between  2,500 –  4,999
1% Plus points for transactions less than  2,500
1% Plus points for Supermarkets and groceries, insurance, car dealerships, fuel, utility Payments, real estate, charity, education, quick service restaurant (fast-food restaurant), transit, government services, telecommunication transactions & spends originating in European Union (EU) countries.
Maintain  50,000 quarterly spends and be the lucky winner to receive  5,000 cashback

For Purchases made on retail spends at merchants located in European Union will be capped at 500 points per statement cycle.

metadata.title: Priority Banking Visa Infinite Credit Card | Emirates NBD

content:
For Purchases made on retail spends at merchants located in European Union will be capped at 500 points per statement cycle.
Plus Points Rewards earned per statement cycle will be capped at 5,000 and maximum of 60,000 Plus Points Rewards can be earned per annum.

Eligibility Criteria
You must be an existing Priority Banking customer to be eligible for the Priority Banking Visa Infinite Credit Card
Required Documents
Duly
filled Credit Card application
Original Emirates ID and copy with passport copy
Latest salary certificate for salaried individuals
Trade license for non-individuals
Latest 3-month original bank statements (or mini ATM statements)
Security cheque
Credit card limit increase
Original passport and copy with visa page
Emirates ID and copy
Salaried individual banking with Emirates NBD:
Latest salary certificate (not more than 1 month old)
Pay slip in case the salary variance is over 10%
